item.title: Ophiuchi HTB Writeup
item.description: 1. Enumeration: Nmap: To scan for open ports and services running $ nmap -sC -sV -oA 10.10.10.227 We only got two open ports: ssh on (port 22), apache server on (port 8080) 2. Web enumeration: let’s discover what’s running over there.. and the source code (press ctrl+u) so we got a Yaml parser and nothing interesting in the source code .. also try any yaml code u get this page as a response: About yaml & parser thing: YAML is a human-readable data-serialization language.

item.title: Tenet HTB Writeup
item.description: 1. Enumeration: Nmap: To scan for open ports and services running $ nmap -sC -sV 10.10.10.223 Web Enumeration: just the apache default page

item.title: Ready HTB Writeup
item.description: 1. Enumeration: Nmap: Web Enumeration: PORT 5080: Got gitlab login form let’s sign up: and we ’re in: checking /help : it’s gitlab version 11.4.7 Searching for exploits: got public one from exploitdb let’s download and edit the exploit: As i remember it didn’t work properly (there are some new versions of this exploit on exploitdb now) and i used another exploit from github back then Github exploit: download and edit: python3 gitlab_rce.

item.title: Bucket HTB Writeup
item.description: 1. Enumeration: Nmap scan: from nmap » let’s add bucket.htb to our /etc/hosts file

item.title: Time HTB Writeup
item.description: Time is a medium machine retired today, but i think it’s an easy and straight forward one. enjoy .. 1. Enumeration: Nmap scan: nmap -sC -sV 10.10.10.214 Web Enumeration: let’s check out the running web server: And the source code: Nothing interesting in the source code. let’s search for hidden directories: $ python3 dirsearch.py -u http://10.10.10.223/ -e txt,html,php,log,zip,bac,bak,tar Nothing useful inside them: also checking /index.php and /index.php/login » gives nothing useful and redirects back to the main page Let’s see the app functionality: when tried the beautifier > it worked fine when tried validator (still in beta version) » tried some meaningless letters gave some suspicious error » will search with it to see its meaning.
